alert.note: Alert for Assumption; St. James; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 07 at 8:56AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern St. James, north central Terrebonne, northwestern Lafourche and southeastern Assumption Parishes through 930 AM CDT... At 855 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Labadieville, or 9 miles east of Stephensville, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Thibodaux, Supreme, Labadieville, Chackbay and Schriever. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; St. James; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne
